name: Downloader
tagline: This is a python3 command-line tool to download tutorial videos from e-learning platforms. It currently supports Cybrary (http://www.cybrary.it)
body:
# downloader
This is a python3 command-line tool to download tutorial videos from e-learning platforms. It currently supports Cybrary (http://www.cybrary.it). 
The following third- party libraries are required:
1. BeautifulSoup4
2. requests
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
